tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mission_type VARCHAR(50),
    mission_reward INT,
    quest_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
  player_id INT,
  quest_id INT,
  mission_id INT,
  completion_status BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quests(quest_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (mission_id) REFERENCES missions(mission_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
	ppid INT PRIMARY KEY,
	pid INT,
	qid INT,
	mid INT,
	completed BOOLEAN
);
CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50), level INT, experience INT);
CREATE TABLE quest (quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY, quest_name VARCHAR(50), quest_description TEXT, quest_difficulty INT);
CREATE TABLE mission (mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, mission_name VARCHAR(50), mission_type VARCHAR(50), mission_reward INT);
CREATE TABLE player_quest_progress (player_id INT, quest_id INT, progress_percentage FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, quest_id));
CREATE TABLE player_mission_progress (player_id INT, mission_id INT, completed BOOLEAN, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, mission_id));
